Job Title: Sales Representative (Wendall Falls)

Location: Raleigh, NC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Customer Service, Marketing, Sales

Description:
Location

Raleigh - 4020 Westchase Blvd., Suite 150

Business

As part of Brookfield Asset Management — one of the largest alternative asset managers in the world — we harness our resources to bring a fresh approach, unparalleled creativity, relentless innovation, and sound ESG practices to the planning, development, and management of buildings everywhere. From offices, retail spaces, and logistics facilities to multifamily residences, hospitality establishments, and mixed-use structures — we are reimagining real estate from the ground up.

We redefine how home and life come together for over 60 years. At Brookfield Residential, a leading North American land developer and homebuilder within the Brookfield Properties family, we have had one goal in mind – to create the best places to call home. From the development of award-winning vibrant communities to the building of well-designed homes and commercial properties, we are committed to cultivating exceptional life experiences for our customers, partners, employees, and members of the community. Learn more.

If you're ready to be a part of our team, we encourage you to apply.

Job Description

Your Team

The Sales Representative plays a supportive role in supporting the Sales team in meeting the sales and settlement goals for the respective community.

This position requires weekend and evening working hours. 

Your Key Deliverables

Sales And Settlements

Achieve sales and settlement goals as defined by the Director of Sales, follow and loans at assigned community, assist purchasers from the point of sale through settlement and beyond, inform purchasers weekly of the status of their new home throughout the entire buying process.

Implementation Of Sales And Prospecting Plans

Responsible for implementing a sales plan for their assigned community, maintain “Salesforce” and “Newstar Sales”, our sales management software, follow up with prospective home buyers on a daily/weekly/monthly basis through multiple communication channels, establish relationships with relocation companies, realtor’s offices, and other businesses by sending out communications, holding presentations, and reaching out to referrals.

Community Management

Maintain the professional appeal of the sales office, model homes, and model parks by working successfully with the cleaners, landscapers, and related staff; attend bi-weekly sales meetings at Brookfield’s corporate office; attend other required worked-related meetings; submit weekly sales tracking through “Tally”, community log, sales-construction meeting notes, and other forms as requested, general knowledge of the homebuilding market and competition for assigned community

Additional Responsibilities

Ensure a professional atmosphere by treating others fair and equitable at all timesAdhere to the rules and guidelines as required by the Fair Housing Laws and U.S. Department of Housing and Disabilities Act

Must Haves

Proven track record of successful sales and/or delivery of high quality customer serviceExcellent written and verbal communication skillsProactive, organized, and self-motivated individualCapable of developing strong client relationshipsAdministrative experience a positiveComputer/Technologically savvy

Your Opportunity 

We are proud to offer our employees what they value most:

Competitive compensationExcellent extended medical, dental and vision benefits beginning day 1401(k) matching, vesting begins day 1Career development programsCharitable donation matchingPaid Volunteer HoursPaid parental leaveFamily planning assistance including IVF, surrogacy and adoptions optionsWellness and mental health resourcesPet insurance offeringA culture based on our values of Passion, Integrity and Community

Brookfield Properties participates in the E-Verify process to confirm the eligibility of candidates to work in the United States.

We are proud to create a diverse environment and are proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We are grateful for your interest in this position, however, only candidates selected for pre-screening will be contacted.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
